data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Although geneticists originally studied inheritance in a wide range of organisms, researchers began to specialize in studying the genetics of a particular subset of organisms. The ____ that ____ research ____ existed ____ a ____ organism ____ encourage ____ researchers ____ choose ____ for ____ study, and ____ eventually a few ____ organisms ____ the ____ for ____ genetics ____. Common research topics in model organism genetics include the study of gene regulation and the involvement of genes in development and cancer.
data.partBlankContent: Although geneticists originally studied inheritance in a wide range of organisms, researchers began to specialize in studying the genetics of a particular subset of organisms. The fa__ that signi______ research alr____ existed f__ a gi___ organism wo___ encourage n__ researchers t_ choose i_ for fur____ study, and s_ eventually a few mo___ organisms bec___ the ba___ for mo__ genetics rese____. Common research topics in model organism genetics include the study of gene regulation and the involvement of genes in development and cancer.
data.answer: 虽然遗传学家最初研究的遗传范围很广，但研究人员开始专门研究某一特定生物体子集的遗传学。对某一特定生物的重要研究已经存在，这一事实将鼓励新的研究人员选择它进行进一步研究，因此最终一些模式生物成为大多数遗传学研究的基础。模式生物遗传学中常见的研究课题包括基因调控以及基因参与发育和癌症的研究。
